description: Updates the logging configuration for the specified SIP media application.

parameters.name: SipMediaApplicationLoggingConfiguration
parameters.description: The logging configuration for the specified SIP media application. EnableSipMediaApplicationMessageLogs (boolean) --- Enables message logging for the specified SIP media application.

nested_params.name: EnableSipMediaApplicationMessageLogs
nested_params.description: Enables message logging for the specified SIP media application.

nested_items.name: SipMediaApplicationLoggingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The updated logging configuration for the specified SIP media application.

nested_items.name: EnableSipMediaApplicationMessageLogs
nested_items.description: Enables message logging for the specified SIP media application.
